issue.title: [Java] Extract copyFrom and copyFromSafe methods to ValueVector interface
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6021](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6021). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently we have copyFrom and copyFromSafe methods in fixed-width and variable-width vectors. Extracting them to the common super interface will make it much more convenient to use them, and avoid unnecessary if-else statements.
